title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Haaram - ఎమరాల్డ్ రేడియన్స్ డైమండ్ హారం
materials: high-clarity Emeralds. The Emeralds showcase a classic rectangular cut. Finished with a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A contemporary take on the classic Haaram, this necklace features a meticulously crafted floral motif using brilliant diamonds. Emeralds are strategically placed as centerpieces, surrounded by diamond halos to create a radiant effect. The design incorporates openwork elements to enhance the sparkle of the diamonds.
colors: Primarily White (Diamonds) and Green (Emeralds) with subtle Gold accents.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for high-end parties and modern festive occasions.
description: This Diamond and Emerald Haaram is a statement piece that effortlessly blends timeless elegance with modern design. The carefully selected Emeralds add a touch of opulence, while the brilliant-cut diamonds guarantee exceptional sparkle. It is a durable, valuable, and truly unforgettable piece, perfect for heirloom preservation.
